subject: Horse Racing
Casinos
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said Monday that a newly formed board overseeing horse racing in New York could bid out Belmont and the state’s two other racetracks to private gambling companies.
snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said Monday that a newly formed board overseeing horse racing in New York could bid out Belmont and the state’s two other racetracks to private gambling companies.
